## Read csv

```{r}
monthly_ppi <- read.csv('Monthly-PPI.csv', skip = 9)
# Filter the data to include only the first 152 rows
monthly_ppi <- monthly_ppi[1:152,]
yearly_ppi <- read.csv('Yearly-PPI.csv', skip = 9)
yearly_ppi <- yearly_ppi[1:152,]

```

```{r}
yearly_ppi
```

```{r}
yearly_rate <- yearly_ppi %>%
```
